|chip1 = Atheros;AR9227; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = RP-SMA |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/28/2013 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "2052500291", "Rev:1.0", and "MADE IN CHINA" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :This is the same text found on the [[Proware PW-DN451D]] and [[TP-LINK TL-WN751ND v1]]'s boards (via their FCC internal photos). It appears the device is using (or is shown as using) AR9227-BC2A.
Additional specifications, per the FCC manual, follow... *Antenna gain: 2 dBi *Dimensions (unit): [[Dimensions::122 mm x 121 mm x 19 mm]] *Dimensions (box): 202 mm x 145 mm x 35 mm *Weight: [[Weight::47 g]] (card), 9 g (one antenna)
A MAC label with a B8:9B:C9 ('''[[SMC]]''') OUI is affixed to the back of the board in the FCC photos. It is presumed to be used...
==Links of Interest== [http://www.smc-asia.com/products03.php?Fullkey=276 Product page on '''SMC Asia'''] :[http://www.smc-asia.com/files/SMCWPCI-N5%20DS%20.pdf Datasheet]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
